Articles.Content:
And the new water system? why don't you talk about that? Boat and submarine parts in 0.21 are going to be the Bomb! I heard they added 50 new underwater easter eggs on Kerbin.

We have officially highjacked this thread.

And the new water system? why don't you talk about that? Boat and submarine parts in 0.21 are going to be the Bomb! I heard they added 50 new underwater easter eggs on Kerbin.

Yep, the new water will be great. It will go well with destructable terrain, because then I'll be able to use my rockets to carve trenches and fill them with water to irrigate the deserts. Then, I'll be able to send boats and submarines up and down them to buy wheat to feed my kerbonauts.

We have officially highjacked this thread.

Well, that's what happens when you complain about the absence of the addition of resources when they weren't even promised for this update

Back on topic (don't want anyone to see this ), I'm looking forward to the astronaut complex. It will pave the way for more things, like career mode.

I laughed throughout the whole thread, gg forums.

In all seriousness, what I'm looking forward to the most is the new Space Center facilities. I MUST CRASH INTO THE- I mean, analyze them very very very closely. And buzz the tower. And probably fail and crash into it.

I laughed throughout the whole thread, gg forums.

In all seriousness, what I'm looking forward to the most is the new Space Center facilities. I MUST CRASH INTO THE- I mean, analyze them very very very closely. And buzz the tower. And probably fail and crash into it.

"Now, time to gently turn the plane around towards the facil- AHHH OH [EXPLETIVE REDACTED] ITS SPINNING" is what usually happens whenever I try to buzz the tower.
Subassembly Management. If it's not in there...We'll see what else in the area of useful features the version will or won't have.

Man, why is no one talking about steam workshop implementation?

I was hoping at least one person would mention clouds! I also can't wait to have to buy my Kerbal a house and drive him to work and feed his family.
Hey we forgot about cities on Kerbin! Might or might not be crashing some Orion drives in New-Kork as soon as .21 is out

Hey we forgot about cities on Kerbin! Might or might not be crashing some Orion drives in New-Kork as soon as .21 is out

(It's actually going to be 'Knew Knork'. The devs said so.)

I'm also looking forward to female kerbals in .21.

oh yes, gotta have kerbettes. Or was that cherbettes, keep forgetting.
wait who said there will be female kerbals?

Man, why is no one talking about steam workshop implementation?

Well I think the devs have said that isn't going to happen. Not like that has ever stopped suggestions before.

I would like to see the workshop myself. Not a deal breaker if it never happens though.

wait who said there will be female kerbals?

The same people who said there would be multiplayer and the city called Knew-Knork

Well I think the devs have said that isn't going to happen. Not like that has ever stopped suggestions before.

I would like to see the workshop myself. Not a deal breaker if it never happens though.

Dude, look at the posts, we're all shooting ideas that are confirmed to not ever happen

Dude, look at the posts, we're all shooting ideas that are confirmed to not ever happen

I also noticed that they're renaming the Sun to "Kerbol", always good to see Squad get good naming ideas from the community.

I also noticed that they're renaming the Sun to "Kerbol", always good to see Squad get good naming ideas from the community.

Wait are you actually being serious here or.

Wait are you actually being serious here or.

Nope, just joking. This thread is blurring the boundaries, man

Nope, just joking. This thread is blurring the boundaries, man

Boundaries? Like those of the Kerbol system????? Dang it, I KNEW there would be more solar systems in .21. Probably FTL with it

Yes, because nobody said that resources would be in .21. Personally, I'm looking forward to multiplayer, weapons and aliens.

Aliens and weapons are confirmed to never be in the game.

Aliens and weapons are confirmed to never be in the game.

That's the joke
ASAS. That is all. I hope it will work well with avionics package and FAR mod.
Don't forget the first person shooter mode

Don't forget the first person shooter mode

Also dont forget the killstreaks
and the love simulator mode

Nope, just joking. This thread is blurring the boundaries, man

... blurred lines? Thanks, now I have to deal with that earworm again.
Merged the "What are you most looking forward to in 0.21" thread with this one.
